column5: Whether or not detailed requirements are provided

column3: This property indicates the ON/OFF status.
This property indicates passage detection hold time in ms.
This property indicates direction of passage (one of 8 different directions).
column4: 0x30: No passage. 0x31 to 0x38: Direction of passage. 0x39: Passage detected but not located. Or, a sensor incapable of detecting passage direction was passed.
